snippet: On Monday, Ford will formally rechristen the Lincoln brand and introduce a television spot that begins with an image of President Lincoln, stovepipe hat and all.
abstract: Ford will roll out a series of changes as it redoubles its effort to revive its flagging Lincoln brand; part of shift will be a new and unusual advertising campaign featuring President Abraham Lincoln.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, Ford will formally rechristen the Lincoln brand and introduce a television spot that begins with an image of President Lincoln, stovepipe hat and all.

headline.seo: Ford Plan to Revive Lincoln Hinges on a New Brand
headline.main: Ford Redoubles Effort to Reawaken Its Sleepy Lincoln Brand
headline.print_headline: Ford Redoubles Effort to Reawaken Its Sleepy Lincoln Brand
